title: Roasted Chickpeas
ingredients: 1 (15 ounce) can chickpeas, drained and rinsed
¼ teaspoon kosher salt, or to taste
1⁄8 teaspoon cayenne pepper, or to taste
method: Step 1: Gather all ingredients. Preheat the oven to 450 degrees F (220 degrees C).
Step 2: Place chickpeas in a bowl and blot with a paper towel to dry them.
Step 3: Toss chickpeas and olive oil in a bowl.
Step 4: Season to taste with garlic salt, cayenne, and salt and toss again.
Step 5: Spread chickpeas on a rimmed baking sheet.
Step 6: Roast in the preheated oven until browned and crunchy, 30 to 40 minutes; watch carefully to avoid burning them.
